name: Markprompt
headline: AI for customer support
description:
Close customer support tickets faster with AI.

We’re building AI infrastructure to power customer support at scale. With Markprompt, companies can automate customer support, scale without increasing headcount, and deliver exceptional user experiences.

Scaling customer support with headcount is expensive, with human resources accounting for 90%+ of customer support expenses. On top of that, customer support agents often burn out leading to turnover and reduced quality. As companies grow, so does their expert knowledge, which is hard to access at scale and makes keeping employees up-to-date nearly impossible.

Markprompt addresses the root of the information access problem by indexing all available knowledge within a company, setting the foundation for a robust system of record to feed the AI. Built from the ground up with an API-first approach, Markprompt provides SDKs (such as React hooks and components) and no-code tools to enable integrations at all touchpoints in the customer journey.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:customer-support; industry:infrastructure; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Marie Schneegans, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Markprompt.

Marie and Michael previously founded Motif, a collaborative docs platform based on Markdown and React. While building Motif, we realized that the tasks of maintaining company expert knowledge up to date and providing stellar customer support are intimately connected, and both can in large part be automated. This led us to build Markprompt.

founders.name: Michael Fester, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Markprompt. Previously, cofounder of Snips (AI voice platform, acq. by Sonos).

raw_markdown="[Markprompt](https://markprompt.com/</>)
  * [Developers](https://markprompt.com/</docs>)
  * [Blog](https://markprompt.com/</blog>)
  * [Careers](https://markprompt.com/</jobs>)
  * [Company](https://markprompt.com/</about>)


[Sign in](https://markprompt.com/<https:/dashboard.markprompt.com/login>)
Artificial Intelligence for customer support 
Enterprise-grade AI agents that solve your hardest support challenges. Specialized for developer platforms and fintech, Markprompt autonomously resolves tickets, unifies data and intelligence, and ensures ironclad reliability under strict compliance standards.
[ Request a demo ](https://markprompt.com/<https:/calendly.com/markprompt/30min>) Contact sales 
Markprompt is a new breed of applied AI company focused on enterprise support operations. We combine machine learning expertise with proven deployment strategies to help global enterprises automate their most critical workflows. Whether you are streamlining tier-1 support or troubleshooting complex customer issues, Markprompt's agents handle it all with unmatched reliability. 
Vercel
“Our AI agent reduced human-handled tickets by 31%, allowing us to maintain high support standards while serving a growing customer base.” 
[ Read the full story ](https://markprompt.com/<https:/vercel.com/blog/transforming-customer-support-with-ai-how-vercel-decreased-tickets>)
### Unleash agents everywhere
#### Deploy AI agents deeply into your operations, empowering every touchpoint with seamless automation and advanced problem-solving capabilities.
Email
Eliminate the backlog with AI-driven email agents that interpret customer issues, gather necessary details up front, and craft precise resolutions—before a ticket even hits your queue. Free your support team to focus on critical tasks while routine inquiries resolve themselves. 
Chatbots
Offer real-time, on-demand support via web chat, in-app messaging, or social channels, effortlessly scaling to meet customer demand. Improve customer satisfaction by delivering immediate answers, reducing wait times, and seamlessly guiding users to the right solutions—no matter where they reach out. 
Voice
Provide 24/7 phone support with AI-powered voice agents that interpret nuanced inquiries, reference live data, and deliver tailored solutions. Whether handling standard questions or urgent scenarios, these agents ensure fast, human-like interactions that keep your customers confident and satisfied. 
Routing
Make sure every ticket lands in the right hands. Our routing agents excel at analyzing inquiries, identifying the right subject matter experts, and forwarding complex or specialized issues to the proper channels. You'll reduce resolution times, prevent escalations, and guarantee that customers always get expert-level attention. 
Agent Assist
Empower your support teams with AI-driven assistance in Zendesk, Salesforce, or any other CRM. Agent Assist automates replies, generates troubleshooting procedures, triages cases, enabling faster resolutions and higher CSAT. 
Reporting
Generate fine-grained reports that uncover hidden patterns in your support operations. From trending bug reports to deep usage insights, these agents help you surface product gaps and engineering opportunities. 
Knowledge
Create new documentation, update existing knowledge, and pinpoint gaps or inconsistencies. Keeping your systems of record accurate is no longer an afterthought—it becomes an automated, continuous process. 
QA & compliance
Ensure compliance and regulatory standards with automated QA workflows. QA agents continuously monitor interactions, enforce standards, and flag anomalies in real time to uphold the highest quality standards. 
### Our agents can work with your systems
####  Our AI agents work inside your existing customer platforms and unify data and APIs across your organization. If you have unique requirements, we'll work with you to build a solution that meets your needs. With our API-first approach, extending and tailoring the system to your specific workflows is effortless. 
### What makes the Markprompt platform powerful
Day-1 Impact
Achieve results from day one with an immediate reduction in support volume and empowered teams. Markprompt's AI agents handle routine queries, freeing your support team to focus on more high leverage tasks. 
Strict Compliance
Operate with confidence knowing every interaction adheres to your policies and standard operating procedures (SOPs), ensuring precision and regulatory compliance at every step. 
No Engineering Lift
Designed for support teams to operate independently, Markprompt requires no engineering involvement, minimizing deployment time and ongoing maintenance effort. 
API-First Architecture
Want to take it further? Markprompt's API-first architecture gives your engineering team the primitives—APIs, libraries, and components—to integrate support deeply into the core product experience. 
### Built for enterprise
Our background in privacy-respecting AI means we excel where precision, compliance, and performance are mandatory. From analyzing bank transactions to orchestrating data flows in complex developer platforms, Markprompt is built to meet the highest operational standards. 
  * SOC 2 Type II certified
  * GDPR compliant
  * Encryption at rest and in transit
  * 0-day retention
  * PII removal


  * SSO
  * Team management
  * Fine-grained access control
  * Audit logs
  * Advanced bot protection


  * Bring your own model
  * Custom fine-tunes
  * Version control
  * Uptime SLAs
  * Dedicated account manager


Trusted by world-class support teams
Vercel ElevenLabsl Replicate Neon CodeSignal Plotly
### FAQ
### What support platforms do you integrate with?
We integrate with any support platforms, such as Salesforce, Zendesk and Slack. Our integrations are seamless and work out of the box.
### How are your agents trained on our data?
Our agents are capable of understanding a broad range of data sources—including knowledge base articles, past tickets, customer data, transaction logs, server logs, internal databases, standard operating procedures, regulatory documents, and real-time incident information.
### Do I need to commit engineering resources?
No. Markprompt works closely with you to fully understand your needs and requirements. If additional work is necessary, we take on engineering efforts to deliver the optimal solution for you, ensuring your support team achieves full autonomy with minimal effort.
### Can I connect with my internal APIs?
Yes. We can work with all kinds of internal systems, including your internal APIs. Our team will take care of the technical heavy lifting, from mapping data to customizing integrations workflows, so you can focus on leveraging your data, rather than worrying about connection details.
### Is Markprompt SOC 2 Type II certified?
Yes, Markprompt is SOC 2 Type II certified. Our SOC 2 report is available on demand to Enterprise customers.
### How do you handle PII?
Markprompt offers PII removal features that can be used on all knowledge and conversations. For instance, if you are syncing historical tickets containing sensitive customer information, Markprompt can redact all the content before it is stored on our servers.
### How is my data secured?
Our platform meets both SOC 2 Type II and GDPR standards to ensure enterprise-level safeguards and data protection. All stored data is encrypted at rest using AES-256, and any data in motion is secured with TLS. In addition, data is backed up every day and backups are retained for 30 days. We partner with industry professionals who conduct regular penetration tests on our platform. Read more on our [security page](https://markprompt.com/</security>).
### Request a demo
We power mission-critical support for the most innovative enterprises—organizations that demand absolute precision, reliability, and proven expertise. If you are ready to bring reliable agents to life, let's partner to elevate your support operation. 
Submit

generated_description:
**Markprompt: Revolutionizing Customer Support with AI**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Markprompt is at the forefront of using AI to enhance customer support. As part of Y Combinator’s Batch W24, this lean startup, with a current team of just two, aims to dramatically reduce the costs and inefficiencies associated with traditional customer support.

### Mission and Approach

Markprompt’s core mission is simple yet ambitious: *AI for customer support*. Picture the typical support operation, with human agents shouldering the massive burden of ticket handling. This method isn't just costly—it’s also prone to burnout and turnover. Markprompt is designed to tackle these issues head-on, providing a scalable AI infrastructure that helps companies automate their support processes effectively. 

Utilizing an API-first architecture, Markprompt allows for smooth integration across various customer journey touchpoints through SDKs and no-code tools. The company seeks to index internal knowledge to create a robust system from which their AI can draw insights, ensuring not only efficiency but exceptional user experiences.

### Product Offering

Markprompt specializes in creating enterprise-grade AI agents that streamline and automate customer support tasks. Here’s what they bring to the table:

- **Email Agents:** Handle incoming customer inquiries automatically, gathering necessary details and crafting responses before they even reach human agents' queues.
- **Chatbots:** Deliver round-the-clock support via web chat, in-app messages, and social media, resolving issues in real-time and reducing wait times.
- **Voice Support:** AI-powered agents ready to provide human-like assistance over the phone, ensuring customer satisfaction with accurate and timely answers.
- **Routing Agents:** Optimize ticket management by identifying the right experts for specific issues, effectively reducing resolution times.
- **Agent Assist:** Enhance human agents’ capabilities inside platforms like Zendesk and Salesforce by automating responses and case triaging.
- **Reporting and Compliance:** Automated systems for monitoring, data analysis, and ensuring adherence to regulatory standards, with a focus on security.

### The Big Picture

Markprompt understands that scaling customer support traditionally means hiring more people, which isn’t sustainable. Their solution not only minimizes the necessity of increasing headcount but also empowers support teams to focus on more complex inquiries, leaving routine tasks to the AI. 

With impressive results, such as Vercel's reported 31% reduction in human-handled tickets, Markprompt is demonstrating the potential for AI to reshape enterprise support operations across sectors, particularly in fintech and developer platforms.

### Security and Compliance

In a world where data privacy is paramount, Markprompt is SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant, with advanced features like data encryption and PII removal for safeguarding sensitive information.

### Conclusion

If you're looking to redefine your customer support landscape through innovative AI solutions, Markprompt is an intriguing contender worth exploring. Whether through seamless integration into your existing systems or comprehensive automation of support tasks, they position themselves as a partner in scaling support operations while maintaining high-quality service standards.

**For more information, check them out at [Markprompt](https://markprompt.com).**
